name: rpg-game
description:
This game tells the story of a player who enters a dungeon to save his friends who are trapped in a dungeon where later players can play a rescued character who has his own powers. For now, there are 3 levels consisting of Level 0 (tutorial), Level 1, and Boss Room also this game is about exploring dungeons that take the concept of speedrunning or fast pacing

Game genre rpg tipe game tiled single player.

Controller

KeyKeyboardupw key / up arrowdowns key / down arrowlefta key / left arrowrightd key / right arrowattackspacepauseescmenutabselect buttonleft click (mouse)
